name: danceable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of music) good for dancing to: We tried to make this album a little more danceable than the previous one. The band played some irresistibly danceable tunes.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was lovely music but not exactly danceable.The audience were on their feet for every danceable song.I don't mind what music he plays, as long as it's danceable.The atmosphere created by live musicians playing danceable music is impossible to duplicate with recordings.This is a very danceable piece of electropop.Acid jazz is a popular variant of jazz that emphasizes a danceable groove over complex improvisation.
